Third-party libraries for nigamp

1. dr_wav.h - Download from: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mackron/dr_libs/master/dr_wav.h
   Place this file in the third_party directory.

2. libmpg123 - Download Windows binaries from: https://www.mpg123.de/download.shtml
   Extract and place headers in third_party/mpg123/ directory.

These libraries are required for building the project.
